trans-unit.source: Provides support for computing a hash or Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) value incrementally across several segments.
trans-unit.target: 支持跨多个段以增量方式计算哈希或基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC) 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the algorithm being performed.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在执行的算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: HMAC algorithms are prepended with "HMAC" to distinguish them from an unkeyed digest.
trans-unit.target: HMAC 算法前面附有“HMAC”，以区别于未经加密的摘要。

trans-unit.source: The name of the algorithm being performed.
trans-unit.target: 正在执行的算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The data to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified data to the data already processed in the hash or HMAC.
trans-unit.target: 将指定数据追加到已进行哈希或 HMAC 处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> 对象已被释放。

trans-unit.source: The data to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: The offset into the byte array from which to begin using data.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组中的偏移量，从该位置开始使用数据。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to use from <c>data</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <c>data</c> 中使用的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified number of bytes from the specified data, starting at the specified offset, to the data already processed in the hash or Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC).
trans-unit.target: 从指定偏移量开始，向已经过哈希或基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC) 处理的数据追加指定数据的指定字节数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="data" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> or <paramref name="offset" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 或 <paramref name="offset" /> 为负数。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the length of <paramref name="data" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="count" /> 大于 <paramref name="data" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the data length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 与 <paramref name="count" /> 的总和大于数据长度。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> 对象已被释放。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to perform.
trans-unit.target: 要执行的哈希算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> for the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 为指定算法创建 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> instance ready to compute the hash algorithm specified by <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> 实例，该实例已准备好计算 <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> 指定的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />

trans-unit.source: is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> is not a known hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> 不是已知的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to perform within the HMAC.
trans-unit.target: 要在 HMAC 内执行的哈希算法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The secret key for the HMAC.
trans-unit.target: HMAC 的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The key can be of any length, but a key longer than the output size of the specified hash algorithm will be hashed to derive a correctly-sized key.
trans-unit.target: 密钥可以为任何长度，但将对长度超过指定哈希算法的输出大小的密钥进行哈希处理，以便派生大小正确的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the recommended size of the secret key is the output size of the specified hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 因此，建议的密钥大小为指定哈希算法的输出大小。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> for the Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) algorithm using the specified hash algorithm and key.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的哈希算法和密钥为基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC) 算法创建 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> class ready to compute the specified hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> 类的一个实例，该实例已准备好计算指定的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" />.<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName.Name" />

trans-unit.source: is <see langword="null" /> or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="null" /> 或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> is not a known hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hashAlgorithm" /> 不是已知的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 释放 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> 类的当前实例使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the hash or Hash-based Message Authentication Code (HMAC) for the data accumulated from prior calls to the <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash.AppendData(System.Byte[])" /> method, and resets the object to its initial state.
trans-unit.target: 检索哈希或基于哈希的消息验证代码 (HMAC)（用于从之前对 <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash.AppendData(System.Byte[])" /> 方法的调用中累积的数据），并将对象重置为初始状态。

trans-unit.source: The computed hash or HMAC.
trans-unit.target: 计算所得的哈希或 HMAC。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> object has already been disposed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.IncrementalHash" /> 对象已被释放。
